channel.title: Nevada County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Nevada County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 185 and 188B
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 185 - CA-89 South/Lake Tahoe. Advanced signage for Exit 188B - CA-89 North/CA-267/Sierraville/Lake Tahoe.

item.title: I-80 East Onramp at Yuba Gap Interchange
item.description: I-80 East onramp at Yuba Gap interchange (Exit 160).

item.title: Approaching I-80 at Yuba Gap Interchange
item.description: Approaching I-80 at Yuba Gap Interchange. Use I-80 west for Sacramento; I-80 east for Reno (Nevada).

item.title: I-80 East Exit 188B Offramp at CA-89/CA-267
item.description: I-80 east Exit 188B offramp at CA-89/CA-267 junction. Turn left for CA-89 north to Sierraville. Turn right for CA-267 south to Lake Tahoe.

item.title: Begin CA-267 East at I-80
item.description: Begin CA-267 east at I-80. Turn right for I-80 east to Reno (Exit 188B); continue ahead for CA-267 east to Lake Tahoe.

item.title: I-80 East Advanced for Exit 188B
item.description: Advanced signage for Exit 188B - CA-267/North Lake Tahoe. Approaching Exit 185 - CA-89 south, Lake Tahoe. Both CA-89 and CA-267 connect Truckee with the north shore of Lake Tahoe.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 184
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 184 - Donner Pass Road

item.title: I-80 East Onramp at Exit 180
item.description: Donner Lake Road at I-80 east Exit 180 onramp (Donner Lake).

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 176
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 176 - Castle Peak/Boreal Ridge Road. Exit 176 provides access to Boreal Ski Area. This exit is at the top of Donner Summit, the highest point on I-80 in California.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 174
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 174 - Soda Springs/Norden

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 184
item.description: I-80 West approaching Exit 184 - Donner Pass Road. Distance marker for CA-20, Colfax, and Sacramento.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 201
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 201 - Farad. This is the last California exit on I-80.

item.title: I-80 East - Donner Summit
item.description: I-80 east at Donner Pass - Elevation 7,227 Feet. This is the highest point on I-80 in California. The highest point on I-80 nationwide is in Wyoming.
